summary.span: 表示显示数据的列。

span.span: Represents a column that displays data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图模式使用 显示一列数据。A is used by the view mode to display a column of data. 实现 视图模式的 为列提供数据。The that implements the view mode provides the data for the column. 使用数据绑定指定 的数据。You use data binding to specify the data for the . 您可以使用 定义要在列中显示的数据。You can use the to define the data to display in a column. 您还可以将数据定义为由 属性指定的 的一部分。You can also define the data as part of a that is specified by the property. 如果不同的单元格具有不同的 对象，则 属性可以指定 。If different cells have different objects, the property can specify a . 以下列表按优先级从高到低的顺序显示此处提到的属性：The following list shows the properties mentioned here, in their order of precedence from highest to lowest: - - - 类还包含一些属性，这些属性可用于定义和自定义列的列标题。The class also contains properties that you can use to define and customize the column header for the column. 属性可以定义列标题的内容。The property can define the content of the column header. 其他属性（如 和 ）还可以指定列标题的内容和样式。Other properties such as and can also specify content and style for the column header. 其中的某些属性也可在其他类（如 类）上找到。Some of these properties are also found on other classes such as the class. 有关用于定义列标题的样式和模板的属性的详细信息，以及有关这些属性的优先级顺序的信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information about the properties that are used to define styles and templates for column headers, and for information about the order of precedence for these properties, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 此接口提供订阅属性值发生更改时发生的事件的功能，如 属性值。This interface provides the ability to subscribe to the events that occur when a change occurs to a property value, such as the property value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义 的 对象。The following example shows how to define objects for a . summary.span: 获取 的实际宽度。

span.span: Gets the actual width of a .
The current width of the column.
The default is zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为 时，可以使用此属性来获取 的当前宽度。You can use this property to get the current width of the when the property is set to . 属性的值 指定列大小可容纳不是列标题的最大可见项。A value of for the property specifies that the column size accommodate the largest visible item that is not the column header. 与 不同， 不是依赖项属性。Unlike , is not a dependency property.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示列单元格内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template to use to display the contents of a column cell.

value.span: 一个用于设置列单元格格式的 。

span.span: A that is used to format a column cell.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下属性都绑定到列单元格的内容并显示其内容，从最高到最低的优先级顺序列出：The following properties all bind to and display the content of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - - - ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). 使用或的绑定引用也是可能的，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定要用于显示 的 。The following example shows how to specify a to use to display a . [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewCellTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewcelltemplate)] [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#CellTemplateProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#celltemplateproperty)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 ，用于确定在列中显示单元格时使用的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets a that determines the template to use to display cells in a column.

value.span: 一个 ，它为列单元格提供 选择。

span.span: A that provides selection for column cells.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下属性都绑定到列单元格的内容并显示其内容，从最高到最低的优先级顺序列出：The following properties all bind to and display the content of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - - - ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个派生自 的类，该类实现实际的 重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该键引用实现实际 重写的派生类。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). 还可以以编程方式将 类的实例作为资源添加到资源字典。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#GridViewColumnContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumncontent)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将数据源中的数据类型与列相关联，以便列显示一组类型的值。This property associates a type of data from a data source to a column so that the column displays a set of values of that type. 数据源对象的示例包括 对象和 对象。Examples of data source objects include objects and objects. 以下属性全部用于定义列单元格的内容和样式，并按优先级顺序从最高到最低的顺序列出：The following properties are all used to define the content and style of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - `DisplayMemberBinding` （此属性）`DisplayMemberBinding` (this property) - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. member this.Header : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the header of a .
The object to use for the column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为像 `string`一样简单的对象，也可以设置为与具有嵌入内容的 复杂的对象。The property can be set to an object that is as simple as a `string`, or to an object that is as complex as a that has embedded content. 视图模式下的默认列标题的样式为一个按钮，该按钮派生自 并将 属性的内容作为其子级。The default column header in a view mode is styled as a button that is derived from and that has the content of the property as its child. 若要指定列标题的模板，请参阅 或 属性说明。To specify a template for the column header, see the or property descriptions. 用于定义列标题的内容、布局和样式的属性可在许多相关类上找到，其中某些属性的功能相似或相同。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values \<*HeaderContentObject*/>\<*HeaderContentObject*.../> 单个元素。A single element. 如果*HeaderContentObject*内容模型允许子元素，则此元素可以包含子元素。This element can have child elements if the *HeaderContentObject* content model allows them. ## 示例Example 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumnproperties)]

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于 标头的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style to use for the header of the .

value.span: 用于定义列标题的显示属性的 。

span.span: The that defines the display properties for the column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和 属性可以共同定义属性值和列标题内容的可视化树。The property and the property can together define property values and the visual tree for column header content. 属性还可以通过定义 来指定可视化树。The property can also specify the visual tree by defining a . 用于定义列标题的内容、布局和样式的属性可在许多相关类中找到，其中某些属性的功能相似或相同。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found in many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). 设置样式时，某些限制适用。When you set a style, some restrictions apply. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *StyleResourceKey**StyleResourceKey* 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 该键引用 中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). 使用或的绑定引用也是可能的，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义一个指定列标题的显示属性的 。The following example shows how to define a that specifies display properties for a column header. [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewHeaderStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewheaderstyle)] [!code-xaml[ListViewTemplate#GridViewColumnTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewTemplate/CS/window1.xaml#gridviewcolumntemplate)] 下面的示例演示如何使用 定义用于定义显示属性的 。The following example shows how to define a that defines display properties by using a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已设置 、或 属性，则忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 您可以使用多个属性来指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置了多个属性，则将列标题的格式设置为具有最高优先级的属性的值。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在多种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示了可用于设置列标题格式的属性，按从低到高的优先级按顺序排列：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果同时设置了 属性和 属性， 属性优先。If both the property and the property are set, the property takes precedence. 用于定义列标题的内容、布局和样式的属性可在许多相关类上找到，其中某些属性的功能相似或相同。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一： `StaticResource`或 `DynamicResource`。One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该键引用实现实际 重写的派生类。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). 还可以以编程方式将 类的实例作为资源添加到资源字典。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个派生自 的类，该类实现实际的 重写。A class that derives from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息，请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 获取或设置列的宽度。

The width of the column.

value.span: 默认值为 ，可自动根据非列标题的最大列项调整大小。

span.span: The default is , which automatically sizes to the largest column item that is not the column header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在此属性设置为 时获取精确宽度，请使用 属性。To get the exact width when this property is set to , use the property. ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - - or - ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *double**double* 值的字符串表示形式。String representation of a value. 这被解释为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 度量。This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement. 字符串不需要显式包含小数点。Strings need not explicitly include decimal points. 例如，`1` 的值是可接受的。For instance a value of `1` is acceptable. *qualifiedDouble**qualifiedDouble* 如上所述的*双精度*值，后跟以下单元声明字符串之一： `px`、`in`、`cm``pt`。A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`. `px` （默认值）为 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]`px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] `in` 为英寸;1in = = 96px`in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` 是厘米;1cm = = （96/2.54） px`cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` 为点;1pt = = （96/72） px`pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px `Auto` 启用自动调整行为。Enables autosizing behavior. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumnproperties)]
